mapper.insert: insert into erp_sales (sales_id, sales_employee, sales_location, sales_date) values(#{sales_id}, #{sales_employee}, #{sales_location}, #{sales_date} )
mapper.update: update erp_sales set sales_date=#{sales_date}, sales_employee=#{sales_employee}, sales_location=#{sales_location} where sales_id = #{sales_id}
